title: Five-Star Historical Italian Luxury with Spa, Pool & Daily Breakfast
description: Step back in time to a moment where architectural beauty reigned supreme with a stay at the luxurious five-star San Gemini Palace. Located in Umbria, a region known for its magnificent landscapes and rich culinary culture, enjoy an escape to this palace-turned-boutique-hotel. With a direct link to hiking and cycling trails, explore the surrounds and then relax into the evening over delicious fare and cocktails at Sapori Diffusi. Take part in wine tasting and cooking classes, or find a sense of rejuvenation at the hotelâ€™s own spa, sauna and wellness centre.
offer_address: Via Casventino, 50, 05029 San Gemini TR, Italy
